class.name: BoxOccluder3D
class.brief_description: Cuboid shape for use with occlusion culling in [OccluderInstance3D].
class.description: [BoxOccluder3D] stores a cuboid shape that can be used by the engine's occlusion culling system. See [OccluderInstance3D]'s documentation for instructions on setting up occlusion culling.
